column4: i need help :/ when i want to start the oracle express database, i get this warning: Operation failed, user ist not a member of the group "dba"
add yourself to the group dba
i did, but then just nothing happens :/
did you log out/log back in?
i have to when i change the group?
oh, k i ll try it :D
i added my username to dba:x:1001:   now it looks dba:x:1001:username @ /etc/group thatz right?
did you try running from the terminal?
that either means that it worked, or it is broken; try re-installing it
k reinstalled, still the same problem :/
still no error message at all?
